    • A young man complained at work, â€œThis kind of government sucks!!!!â€ and was arrested by a police officer. The young man defended: â€œI didnâ€™t say which government it was, how could you arrest me casually?â€ â€œYou donâ€™t lie,â€ the policeman smiled, â€œIâ€™ve worked here for more than 20 years, which government is badï¼Œshould I not know?â€

    • On the road, Brezhnev saw a man carrying a watermelon home. He stopped the car and greeted the man, asking him to sell him the watermelon. â€œOkay, Comrade Brezhnev.â€ The man said, â€œYou choose one.â€, â€œBut there is only one watermelon.â€, â€œThatâ€™s how we chose you.
